backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling user profiles, product management with admin authorization, and Stripe configuration with permission checks and traps for unauthorized access.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels for deployment, Stripe readiness, and error‑handling improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Index of concise frontend component descriptions generated for build planning and documentation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH color theme defining light and dark mode variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx with Internet Identity and subscription feature title.
frontend/OPS-NOTE-release-deploy.md: Operations note documenting root causes of a deployment failure and detailing fixes such as error handling, Stripe checks, and new payment routes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing authentication, simple routing for payment pages, profile setup gating, and rendering the upgrade flow.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright info and Caffeine.ai attribution with dynamic referral tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header providing login/logout controls, user greeting, and toast‑based error handling for authentication issues.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Shows a payment cancelled message with retry navigation and support info.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Displays a successful payment confirmation and a button to return to the app.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Collects and saves the user's name with error handling and loading states.
frontend/src/components/StripeUpiCheckli: Provides a dialog containing a step‑by‑step guide for enabling UPI in Stripe.
frontend/src/components/UpgradePro.tsx: Handles Pro plan upgrades, Stripe checkout initiation, and related authentication and config checks.
frontend/src/components/UpiHelpSection.t: Explains how UPI works in Stripe Checkout and warns against direct payments.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth handling, providing login, logout, and identity state via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profile retrieval/saving, Stripe configuration checks, and creating Stripe checkout sessions via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and shared styling tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Maps technical errors to friendly user messages for common cases like Stripe issues, JSON parsing, and auth failures.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radius, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including versioning, feature summaries, architecture notes, and known issues.
